scripts.build: yarn run lint && rm -rf build && tsc && cp -a nse-expo-plugin/NotificationService.h build/ && cp -a nse-expo-plugin/NotificationService.m build/ && cp -a nse-expo-plugin/NSENotificationServiceExtension-Info.plist build/ && cp -a nse-expo-plugin/NSENotificationServiceExtension.entitlements build/
